alternativeNames: Lisboa, Mrs.J.C.; Lisboa, Dona; Rodrigues, Júlia
comments: Published under the name: Mrs. J.C. Lisboa
examples: Andropogon odoratus J.R.Lisboa, J. Bombay Nat. Hist. Soc. iv. 118, 123. 1889
notes: wife of José Camilo Lisboa; In Portuguese, Dona before the name of a women [same as: Mrs. or Ms.] and may be abbreviated as: D., Da. or Dna.
source: Brief Biography in: Portuguese Stud. Review 25(1): 324-326. 2017
